trackerDrivenFinder_cff.py

00001 import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms
00002 
00003 #===================================================== removing events with trackerDrivenOnly electrons
00004 # if you want to filter events with trackerDrivenOnly electrons
00005 # you should produce a collection containing the Ref to the
00006 # trackerDrivenOnly electrons and then you should filter these events
00007 # the lines to produce the Ref collection are the following
00008 # you should not need to uncomment those, because I've already
00009 # produced them in the ALCARECO step
00010 trackerDrivenOnlyElectrons = cms.EDFilter("GsfElectronRefSelector",
00011                                           src = cms.InputTag( 'gsfElectrons' ),
00012                                           cut = cms.string( "(ecalDrivenSeed==0)" )
00013                                           )
00014 
00015 # these lines active a filter that counts if there are more than 0
00016 # trackerDrivenOnly electrons 
00017 trackerDrivenRemover = cms.EDFilter("PATCandViewCountFilter",
00018                                     minNumber = cms.uint32(0),
00019                                     maxNumber = cms.uint32(0),
00020                                     src = cms.InputTag("trackerDrivenOnlyElectrons")
00021                                     )
00022 #trackerDrivenRemoverSeq = cms.Sequence( trackerDrivenOnlyElectrons * trackerDrivenRemover )
00023 #trackerDrivenRemoverSeq = cms.Sequence( trackerDrivenOnlyElectrons)
00024
